data.name: Yuri Portugal
data.Profile: Software Engineer with 10 years of experience implementing and leading development software projects. High skills in solving conflicts , adaptable to changes and empathy with the project team and stakeholders. Interested in new software technologies and decentralized applications in the blockchain.

experience.jobDescription: Leading and document software projects for academic and administrative departments at PUCP. Responsible for analysing and design software solutions, also estimate and scheduling user requirements. Responsible for supervising the development team during the project, software testing, user presentation, and deploying the software to production. Softwares deployed to production:  Orcid and Campus Virtual  integration, Professor's Contract Addenda Management,  Professor Work Plan.

Support the project management and analyze, design, and implement software solutions for academic and administrative departments at PUCP. Responsible for unit and integration tests, user presentations, and deploying software to production.Softwares deployed to production:  Web services for professor website,   Research Groups Management and Evaluation, Social Responsibility Fund, Teaching Innovation Fund.

Support the project management and analyze, design, and implement software solutions for academic and administrative departments at PUCP.
